name: Tricky Soccer
description:
Kick the ball right in the goal in this frenzy addictive arcade-soccer game!

This is penalty shootout at its best!
Kick the ball and avoid touching the opponent players to score.

You only have to slide your finger, aim and stop touching the screen to throw your ball at super-speed to the goal.
Sounds pretty easy right?

Tricky Soccer features:
- Addictive and intuitive touch-based gameplay
- Danger-rewarding scoring system
- A ton of levels to unlock and master
- A challenging experience to share with your friends
- A colorful cartoon-styled universe

Bounce on the walls, pass close of the defenders or touch the goals spots to increase your score.
Can you shoot the ball without touching an opponent three times in a round?
Some levels are near impossible...

Try Tricky Soccer to challenge yourself, it’s totally free!
